pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.1_0: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.2_0: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.3_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.3_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
